pullRequest.title: minor cleanups
pullRequest.bodyText:
presizing of few internal data structures
removing unused method in ExecutionStrategy (public api, technically a breaking change)
removing unused methods in Async (internal api)
removing few unnecessary annotations

nodes.bodyText: technically a breaking change but hopefully nobody is using it
@andimarek - do you want these methods?  They clearly have no tests or usage otherwise it would blow up

minor cleanups

- removing few unnecessary annotations
